title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 13.6 - Time and place for filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 13.6 - Time and place for filing

State Regulations
(a) Form CBD, form CADV and form CM-2 must be filed with the Department of Law prior to engaging in any activity covered by the registration. (b) The information required by sections
13.3
and
13.4
of this Part shall be filed no later than 30 days after the change in circumstances has occurred. Any changes which occur within 30 days of each other may be reported by filing one appropriate form with the applicable fee. (c) Whenever in these regulations there is a reference to submission or filing with the Department of Law, this
shall mean the New York State Department of Law, Bureau of Investor Protection and Securities, 28 Liberty Street, New York, NY 10005. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. &
Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
13.6

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
